short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple web extension to get the creation date of a course

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple web extension allow you to visualize the creation date of an Udemy course so you could make a better desicion in whether you buy it or not.

Just click on the extension icon and you are good to go üßê
